answers.answer: I failed my 1 hour test also. He vent done the 3 hrs test yet but I have talked to several expecting moms and they said they failed the one hour but everything was fine with the three hour test. From the reading I have done, if you are diagnosed with gestational diabetes this early, chances are high that you were already diabetic since gestational diabetes begins 20-24 weeks into pregnancy. (That is based on the websites I read from.)

question: My 1 hour glucose test came back abnormal i am kind worried now i have to go back to get the 3 hour test. I dont want to have gestational diabetes im only 13 weeks and been eating healthier since i became pregnant Anyone else going through the same situation??
title: abnormal 1 hr glucose test
